column4: p. 348Although not given a language designation in The Etymologies
column5: anwa is glossed as a Quenya word in http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/wordlists.htm Quettaparma Quenyallo (Quenya Wordlists) (accessed 29 November 2010)The word is derived from the Elvish Sundocarme ANA. Compare the near-synonym nanwa.
